legend.(+): latest update is cracked with all the DLC's
legend.(-): all DLC's are cracked, but the latest patch is uncracked
legend.(x): the latest DLC or multiple ones are uncracked
legend.A: Not confirmed but based on the assumption that the game will use Denuvo
legend.GOG: Steam version still uses Denuvo, GOG version available
legend.DRM Free: Cracked using a DRM free leak (Usually P2P)

notes: UWP version has no Denuvo. It uses UWP DRM instead. Steam version still has Denuvo.
